website_summaries.verdict: These have everything you could want in a pair of rings – light texturing, durability for both indoor and outdoor use, fantastic straps and they even meet Olympic standards – just in case.
pros: Pair of plastic gym rings lightly textured for gripping
Come with durable straps with high-quality buckles
Weight limit of more than 550 pounds

customer_reviews.title: Love my rings!
customer_reviews.text: The rings are great! I've had them 4 months now and use them often for bodyweight workouts. The number markings make them simple to setup and use. IMO I think they are heavy duty and will last me a very long time. Update: Its been almost a year since I got these and they are still holding up very well. I even found a new use for them, as safety straps during bench press. I just take the rings off, sling them over the pull up bar on my rack and put my barbell through them. They have saved me from 225 lb falling on my neck!
customer_reviews.author: No1special

customer_reviews.title: Texture is fantastic for creating callouses, but pretty tough until you have your hands built up.
customer_reviews.text: Really stout rings. I shopped around eBay and Amazon and came back to this set because the straps are wider than others and the reviews said there was a really good texture to prevent slipping. That is certainly true, but the texture is really sharp. I actually knocked it down with a little sandpaper and now my wife can also use these. The texture is fantastic for creating callouses, but pretty tough until you have your hands built up. Straps were super long, which is helpful if you want to hang from a really high ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: GLo

customer_reviews.title: Holds the rings in place
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for about 2 months and am very pleased. I purchased my rings approximately 10 years ago to use for Cross fit workouts. The original straps did the job for many years but then started to slowly come undone as I exercised. After reading the good reviews, I decided to give these a try. What I immediately noticed was these straps were wider than my original straps. This gives the straps a more secure feel. The buckle cam is of very good quality making the straps easy to adjust. I have not noticed any strap slippage when I am exercising. I do expect these straps to last many years without a problem.
customer_reviews.author: M. C.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I used to use another pair of buckles for my rings (exactly like the silver ones are seen in the picture) and after a few years of use the buckle finally broke. I do weighted chinups with rings so I'm putting a LOT of strain on the buckle, and I can confidently say after using these for a few weeks they are stable as you could ever need rings to be. I've gone upside down, done 70lb weighted chinups (BW is ~165lbs) and have not noticed a single bit of movement in the straps. Bodybuilders looking for a strap to do weighted ring chinups with, look no further. Get these. They'll last a life time and are cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Mason

customer_reviews.title: Must have for home gym while ‘Rona has us locked down
customer_reviews.text: These rings are easy to use and sturdy. The cam used to lock the strap in place works well and I haven’t noticed any slip and I weigh about 200 pounds. I have only used them once since they arrived but I enjoyed using them during my at home workout. The rings are plastic and are nicely textured for grip.
customer_reviews.author: Tundra

customer_reviews.title: SO much nicer than the cheapo brand
customer_reviews.text: I bought a cheaper brand of rings and straps and am glad I didn't die from this moment of cheapskatedness. Sheesh. I was inverted and the buckle snapped. The rings seem fine so I got these replacement straps and oh man, these are lovely! A total pleasure in every way. So easy to thread and adjust. The color is gloriously pretty - it was very hard to choose because they were all so nice but I got the pink - it's cotton candy pink. So nice. I am glad I didn't get killed by the junk brand and I'm so glad I now have these beauties.
customer_reviews.author: FitCatLady

customer_reviews.title: Save a life
customer_reviews.text: excellent quality. straps are long enough to save somebody drowning off the side of a boat (bonus function????) however i am simply using these for backyard calisthenic type excercises and do not think i will be needing 2/3rds-1/2 of the length. i decided not to cut them incase im camping and would like to use a tree branch to get my groove on with.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as needed. I have always preferred the wooden handles, but these are a great alternative for the price. I only use these a for a couple of exercises a week, so I did not need to invest in anything expensive. I am happy for the price I paid. If I used these more frequently than a wooden set would be preferred.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Nice rings
customer_reviews.text: Nice rings. They are very solid and feel like they could support hundreds of pounds. The straps are ample and easy to use with no slipping. I have them attached to my pull up bar. The straps are very long and even have built in Velcro to tie up the extra material. Very nice high quality rings that will last for many years.
customer_reviews.author: C.Beatty

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! (Get the ones with numbers, super helpful)
customer_reviews.text: I had bought the X Fitness version and these were a step up. Not sure if these are made by the same company and are just being re-branded, but the buckle/clamp design is the same, but the garage one was built much better. And for those who are debating to get numbers or not, go with the numbers.
customer_reviews.author: A.A.

customer_reviews.title: That would be a AWESOME for me haha
customer_reviews.text: had these for almost a month now as i take my time with a product before leaving feedback, i ll say that these ring are awesome and aesthetically pleasing also. and the number lines make it so much easier for me to strap the rings evenly. i wish all of the colloway wouldve came with the nimber feature, i probably wouldve gotten a different colorway . seller was also awesome to follow up after delivery. def recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: These work great. They are very secure and hold my weight without issue. My daughter likes to use them as well and swings all over the place without a problem. I have them on brackets mounted to rafters in my garage which have drywall over them. There are no issues with them shifting or not holding. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm a 47 year old father of 4 and I ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 47 year old father of 4 and I was looking for an alternative to the gym to not only tone but build muscle. Gymnastics rings are the ticket, try them!! But get these straps if you do!! This is the 2nd set of straps I've purchased recently. The first set was missing the numbered markings (an absolute must to be able to progress efficiently) but where this really shines is the buckle. Solid, near bomb proof. Just get the ring/strap set and be done with it. 👍
customer_reviews.author: Lundy Verdoni

customer_reviews.title: First impression: built to last
customer_reviews.text: (Husband purchase) just received these today and have only tried a few exercises on them. First impression is that they seem very sturdy. The straps are thick and secure nicely on the buckle. The rings have a rough texture to avoid slipping but the are not uncomfortable by any means. I am over 200lbs and feel confident that these will last for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: shannon lamott

customer_reviews.title: Quality and affordability.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. Have a suspension trainer but wanted to try rings. A friend recommended Garage Fit and I couldn't be more happy with my purchase. The straps are high quality, buckles are the best I've seen. Highly recommend this product. You don't have to spend $200 to get a suspension system that will last you for years. Buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan P.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable ring grips, very durable straps and clasps
customer_reviews.text: I like the heavy duty durable straps and clasps. The straps are long enough for use on higher ceilings. Rings are well made and are easy to grip.
customer_reviews.author: Peter C

customer_reviews.title: They are easy to slide out of the way when not in ...
customer_reviews.text: I have these hanging in the garage and I'm able to do the exercises without having to go to the gym. They are easy to slide out of the way when not in use, and they do not slip or slide along the wooden support beam when I am using them. The only thing I would like better would be if the part I grip was flat instead of rounded. They came quickly , packaged nicely and easy to install. The excess strap is kept out of the way with the velcro that is attached.
customer_reviews.author: Jim from SJV Parish

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a 3 yrs old gymnast.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 3 yrs old, so there is not much I can say about its sturdiness since not much weight is put against it, for my daughter it's just perfect. I had to reduced the length of the rope to adjust it to my daughter's height.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent for the money. I work as a trainer and bought several sets that are still in action being used several times a week all day long. Some clients complain about having their feet in the rings in the prone position as it’s not as comfortable as the soft TRX strap, but it’s also easier to get in and out of.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Van Loan

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and very sturdy. Straps and metal adjusters are very well built....if I had to, I would buy them again.....but it looks like I won't ever have to.
customer_reviews.author: Davin C.

customer_reviews.title: Great rings, great straps. Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for numbered straps so I won't need to waste my time during exercises adjusting them by the eye. I'm very happy with them! The straps feel and look good while making the adjustment easy and fast. Also, the rings themselves are very sturdy and comfortable. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Omer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Rings
customer_reviews.text: The strap material, clasps and rings are high quality. My three and five year olds and I have had lots of fun swinging and flipping with them. We have also used them to swing from one ground pad to another Indiana Jones-style. I think the rings make a flexible and adult-usable alternative to the ring sets that one might get for playground equipment. The rings are easily grip able by my three year old and not too small for me. To stabilize I make a second loop over the swing set that crosses the first loop. The straps are very long so work in a variety of situations.
customer_reviews.author: Adolph Trudeau

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product.  Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.text: These are solid. I don't use them for rings but as a dip weight belt. Got the idea from a PT I follow online. So small, no lugging a ridiculous belt and chain! Fits in my Gym bag and can use to load Tricep and Peck dips. Perfect. Strong.
customer_reviews.author: C. Chuateco

customer_reviews.title: Home gym in one :-)
customer_reviews.text: These work perfectly and handle my weight(225lbs) with no signs of stress. My wife also likes them as she's never used rings before. Honestly, these are a home gym when set up correctly.
customer_reviews.author: JK_38

customer_reviews.title: The straps are super strong. And the rings are easier to handle ...
customer_reviews.text: The straps are super strong. And the rings are easier to handle than traditional wood rings. This is the best set of gymnastics rings that I have ever used. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: BJ Kim

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic straps
customer_reviews.text: Way superior to my original straps. Tough. Easy to adjust. Would recommend throwing away your original straps and getting these. Even though they say don't leave outside, I do with mine. In my tropical country it still stands up to the sun and rain - for months now.
customer_reviews.author: Panduranga S.

customer_reviews.title: Dead Ringers for value and feel!
customer_reviews.text: I like the feel of these style of gymnastic rings over wooden ones, so I bought these to have a second pair and make a short pair to go with the long pair I already have. Great buy, as described and great value.
customer_reviews.author: ermacpd

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality overall on the rings
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Quality overall on the rings, straps and buckles. The rings are heavier than I expected. Definitely would recommend to anyone considering rings. My son said that he still needs to use chalk powder with these, but they are textured and provide a decent grip
customer_reviews.author: samuelcrash

customer_reviews.title: Solid buy
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these for dips, pull ups, swings etc.. I was a bit uncertain about ordering online with so many other options but I'm happy with the purchase. They hold strong and I anticipate getting a lot of use out of them.
customer_reviews.author: K.R.

customer_reviews.title: Got our money's worth x100!
customer_reviews.text: These rings are legit. We purchased them for our basement for a winter activity for the kids, and they have stood up to so much (wild!) use! Durable enough to be part of a legitimate home gym, too. Expecting to have these around for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Clara B

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: These are a great length, and ours have been outdoors for several months and show no signs of wear. I have four kids who play on them practically daily. They're easy for my older children to adjust, for the little ones or if they want to use them for different activities. The color ms the photo well andday so far no fading.
customer_reviews.author: LovnLif79

customer_reviews.title: easy setup , easy to adjust
customer_reviews.text: easy setup and easy to adjust the numbers make adjustments easy
customer_reviews.author: Tom Mack

customer_reviews.title: works well, color might not be what you think
customer_reviews.text: I own a CrossFit gym and was looking to replace the straps in our gym so I purchased a pair of these. They were great the color I bought was red and they looked and functioned well. So I recently purchased 5 more RED pairs. Even though the packaging says RED, the 2nd order of straps were more purple or pinkish, not the same true red that the 1st pair was. It was kinda of disappointing but the rings do function well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Starich

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I've seen a lot of lower quality products for more money. These will outlast my interest in using them I'm sure.
customer_reviews.author: That guy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Best home gym equipment I ever bought. These rings are great and the markings make it super easy to align and play around with different lengths.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph G.

customer_reviews.title: Not the best for muscle-ups.
customer_reviews.text: This will fit my needs, pushups and dips. Plastic rings don’t work well for muscle-ups.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. I wanted something that would give my hands and arms more flexibility. I was having a lot of pain from keeping my arms too straight while doing chin ups. This allows me to change my angle, height, etc.
customer_reviews.author: A. Watman

customer_reviews.title: These are great straps. I like how they are numbered so ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great straps. I like how they are numbered so you can line them up. When I bought straps years ago from another seller they were not numbered, and it was a big pain to make sure they matched up. They also come with a velcro strap to tie up the unused portion of the straps. That was also a big headache to keep them tied up in the past. Good product !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Fits easy and har markings for accuracy and symmetric usage
customer_reviews.author: Rayyaan

customer_reviews.title: Adequate diameter
customer_reviews.text: The rings are great.Size and cover like the ones I used in schools and later in YMCAs for years,now use for hands hanging often to relieve occasional low back pain. Still works at 96
customer_reviews.author: Alden C. Ringer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and well made. Straps do not slip and are easy to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Jason W.

customer_reviews.title: High quality rings
customer_reviews.text: These are very well made and durable. I was very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Polly

customer_reviews.title: Just what my wife wanted
customer_reviews.text: They seem to be well made and are exactly what my wife wanted. Price was right too. We have them hanging from our pull-up bar in the garage and they work great.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: and black
customer_reviews.text: Got the wrong color, but so what. I got yellow rings and black straps instead of the yellow straps and black rings. I love them. Super quality and the buckles on these are so nice and easy to use. Plus they look fantastic. Highly recommended!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brian RN

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and high quality
customer_reviews.text: These ring straps are nicely priced for such high quality. The buckles present zero slippage so need to worry about dropping down. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Really good product. I have them descend from my half rack pull up bar, and they’ve really added a lot to my home gym workouts. I’m not very heavy (about 150 lbs), but they feel like they could easily hold someone much heavier. They’re easy to adjust and very sturdy. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Feel higher quality than wood versions. Comfortable for pullups, dips and pushups
customer_reviews.author: David K Stone

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Straps
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to set-up, soft material, buckle seems very quality and the measurements are really helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Paul Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: it seems to be a lasting good, i've been training with for several weeks without issues.
customer_reviews.author: Cliente de Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, quality rings!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these rings for our home ninja warrior training course. These rings are sturdy and durable. I would have expected to pay way more for these rings. We are very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: 3CKM

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these Rings! My almost 3 year old can use them, as well as myself and husband. The straps are very long, and allow you to adjust as much as needed. Only thing I didnt like is you cant pick the color of the straps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t stay for long
customer_reviews.text: I had the rings for maybe 2 months and they worked fine used them maybe 3 times but I just tried to use them again and the part you put through wouldn’t stay when I hung and the rings. Not very happy at all spent my money on what I thought was a good product and it’s not at all. Refund would be nice but doubtful.
customer_reviews.author: Jentrie

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Product is well priced and quality. The rings feel sturdy. And its textured for better grip. Chalk may not be necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Swain

customer_reviews.title: Snapped in half
customer_reviews.text: This snapped mid muscle up. Needless to say I have a very sore shoulder. I've had them 2 yrs, but they are only used maybe once a week. Pretty scary to have it snap mid swing....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: fantastic quality, shipped on time, the rings are strong and the straps are numbered and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: cityjunk

customer_reviews.title: No pain, no gain!
customer_reviews.text: Bomb.com straps. Now I have no excuses to do muscle ups
customer_reviews.author: Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: Nice set, found cheaper elsewhere but it gets the job done for both male and females
customer_reviews.author: Amazonshopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Great for garage gym
customer_reviews.text: Great for garage gym. More than adequate if u know what you are doing. Release clips work well and are easy to adjust
customer_reviews.author: Steve D Burman

customer_reviews.title: Straps
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and they check with you to make sure every thing is too your liking. The straps are stronger than original straps and are easier to insert straps through buckle device.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and the straps that are included are perfect
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and the straps that are included are perfect! The most common complaint I hear is that the rings are good but the straps are not long enough, too fragile, etc. but these have plenty of material with the small addition of velcro ties that make rolling up the straps easy.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Professional Gym Quality
customer_reviews.text: These are heavy duty. Very strong quality. Not cheap. The buckle is so important and this one is quality. Very loooooooooooong too. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Loreena G.

customer_reviews.title: Get some to add a new dimension to your workout.
customer_reviews.text: Ones of the best pieces of gym equipment I’ve purchased. A way better workout than I was expecting. The unstableness of using it is great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally, great set of rings
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put up and very sturdy, neither of which was true with any other rings I've tried. The other great thing is they are very easy to adjust. I'd highly recommend these rings and I tried quite a few.
customer_reviews.author: E. L. Booth

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I love it Great Quality These rings make a great addition to my training This durable straps hold up to the most intense workouts The rings are made of thick plastic and are easy to grip even with sweaty hands. thank you
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Paul in Walla Walla
customer_reviews.text: Extremely fast service! Arrived well packaged and as described. The buckle is the strongest I've seen and the straps are really long enable me to use these more places than you can imagine. Well done
customer_reviews.author: Paul Owens

customer_reviews.title: Great product, easy to level the rings
customer_reviews.text: Great product, easy to level the rings. Any sort of marking on the straps would make it a little easier though. Don't cut the velcro when you open the straps as it is used to hold the rolled up excess nylon.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Mounts

customer_reviews.title: Extra long. No slip. Heavy duty.
customer_reviews.text: These straps are great and is extra long for my or garage. No slip. Heavy duty and easily adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works just fine
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I decided on these rings because the clips were thicker and stronger. Your hands don't slip on the rings either. Good quality overall and a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Gillian Howden

customer_reviews.title: Durable and easy to adjust
customer_reviews.text: We use these in our gym and have had no problems. They work great
customer_reviews.author: Jason Bergstrom

customer_reviews.title: great customer service
customer_reviews.text: The straps are just what we were looking for! Fast shipping, great customer service, fun colors and made of quality materials. We will definitely be using these sellers again!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Great product for plastic rings
customer_reviews.text: Great product for plastic rings, reason why I rated it at a 4 star and not 5.. Buckle is perfect and holds myself at 180lbs... Straps Dnt loosen at all! 👍
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Fox

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy these rings!
customer_reviews.text: These rings slide! Yes, I know how to set them up. I’m a deer hunter and I use safety hornets all the time. Don’t buy these rings!
customer_reviews.author: AMINE EL IAHIAI

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, quality
customer_reviews.text: I put four of these up in my garage. Sturdy, quality, and easily adjustable. I'm delighted with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: M. Chagoyan

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: They work as expected. Nice wide straps and easy to use buckles. Love the markings on the straps for quick adjustment!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon K.

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Quality hardware and rings...Follow a good program and you will get strong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Good to use for ninja course and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Good to use for ninja course and ring pushups.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: My grandchildren love these. Will be getting more in different colors
customer_reviews.text: My grandchildren love these. Will be getting more in different colors. The service here is excellent. The shipping is the quickest!
customer_reviews.author: Samme

customer_reviews.title: Awesome rings and straps
customer_reviews.text: These rings are great the straps are heavy duty and with the numbers on the straps you can adjust evenly and quickly to the right height . I would differently recommend this to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what my grand daughter needed to practice her gymnastics at home.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Original straps I bought (from another company) would slip. These are rock solid, don’t slip even when doing muscle ups. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Wiseman

customer_reviews.title: I especially like the fact that the velcro is attached and not ...
customer_reviews.text: These rings are very solid and hold well. I especially like the fact that the velcro is attached and not loose so I can tie up the excess. The grip is a little rough from plastic
customer_reviews.author: Cole Berhorst

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty straps
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace the original ring straps. This is good quality straps and easy to use. The straps are thick and long. The locks are secure and easy to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Nat

customer_reviews.title: Nice straps.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent high quality webbing, I like the buckles and I like the color. It's nice to have a color choice other than black. Fast shipping. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Delivered really fast, amd I was about to install in really easy. I was able to teach my niece to use and adjust at her will so she can use it to become stronger and play
customer_reviews.author: C Mielo

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: First time using Gymnastics rings and I gotta say these feel hella sturdy. Hopefully they continue to do so.
customer_reviews.author: G. V.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy using these for my pull ups, need to work up to different stuff.
customer_reviews.author: jack

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Excelent customer service, durable materials and performs as it should, very high quality product, huge thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty Strraps
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality straps. They are wider, and thicker than the ones that came with my rings, and the buckles are very heavy duty. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tom B.

customer_reviews.title: Solid/easy to adjust
customer_reviews.text: Very strong, solid buckles that makes it easy and quick to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: More rumble than others specially due to the buckle design.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Ulises Ortiz Zepeda

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to set up, super easy to adjust. Item came very quickly and i am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does the job- doesn’t slip at all when clips hung properly.
customer_reviews.author: P. H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 9' back porch
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because I was looking for more substantial buckles. They support my 220lbs well and they aren't seeing any signs of wear after about a month of use (and I'm keeping them hung up outside).
customer_reviews.author: David C

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy product
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy product . I was worried that the straps may be inferior but I can say that they are very well made . The buckle is strong as are the rings . Great product
customer_reviews.author: Akeil Lee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These rings are everything you would expect them to be. They work as advertised!
customer_reviews.author: F. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great rings
customer_reviews.text: These rings are great. Exactly what's i was looking for. The rings themselves have textured handles so they don't slip and the straps are plenty long and easy to adjust. Also, super fast shipping. Now i just need to practice.
customer_reviews.author: Joe M.

customer_reviews.title: Must have.
customer_reviews.text: They have done more than enough. The straps are solid and the rings are comfortable. I highly recommend a set!

product_meta.title: Garage Fit Gymnastic Rings - Premium Heavy Duty Cross Training, Gymnastics, Fitness, Exercise Rings
product_meta.description:
Gymnastic Rings 


Are you tired of replacing your wooden gym rings every few months? Are you spending as much on chalk as you do on the rings? If you are searching for a premium quality set of rings that will last as long as you do in the gym, then look no further. Garage Fit brings to you a new elite standard in Cross Training equipment. 



These plastic gymnastic rings are a step above the rest in appearance and support. Fashioned to resemble the rings used in influential training gyms, the quality is nothing short of excellence. Forget about slippery and bulky metal rings and train as if you're competing with the real stage feel of the plastic rings. 

Plastic gym rings are more than just a pretty piece of equipment. Approved for in-door and out-door use, they are as tough as your workouts. Best of all, no chalk is needed as they hold their own and yours. 

These rings are specifically manufactured to fit Olympic standards and take a lot of punishment. After production, each and every ring must pass a thorough inspection before shipment. If they don't pass, they don't ship. 
No plastic gymnastic rings are complete without an equally impressive strap. These aren't your ordinary straps with a mediocre clip. This strap is made for those individuals who show up to train, not talk. With a weight limit of over 550 pounds, they are as hardcore as your workouts. 

From the Muscle Up to the Front Level, there are no exercises this ring set cannot handle. 



- Heavy duty solid abs rings – FIG spec for comfortable grip 
- Straps and buckles included - Hook up in seconds 
- Diameter: 9" 
- Inside diameter: 6.75" 
- Ring thickness: 1.11" 
- Strap length: 15ft 
- Strap Width: 1.5" 
- Weight: 4 lbs 
- Capacity: 550 lbs
feature_bullets: Creates fun, athletic challenge; advanced design for added stability
The highest quality ABS plastic gym ring on the market, premium quality buckles
Supports such exercises as push-ups, iron cross, dips, pull-ups, and more
Perfect for Cross Training and gymnastics enthusiasts
2 - 9" O.D. Rings 1.11" diameter and a pair of 15 foot straps with high quality buckles
